text: Get Heavy is the first album from the Finnish hard rock/heavy metal band Lordi. == Track listing == # Scarctic Circle Gathering – 01:02 # Get Heavy – 03:00 # Devil Is a Loser – 03:29 # Rock the Hell Outta You – 03:07 # Would You Love a Monsterman? – 03:04 # Icon of Dominance – 04:35 # Not the Nicest Guy – 03:12 # Hellbender Turbulence – 02:46 # Biomechanic Man – 03:22 # Last Kiss Goodbye – 03:08 # Dynamite Tonite – 03:14 # Monster Monster – 03:23 # 13. – 01:08 Category:Lordi albums Category:Debut albums Category:2002 albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Get Heavy
